Accounts Management Commands¶

List of all django management commands for ‘accounts’ app.

Clear user tokens¶

class accounts.management.commands.accounts_clear_user_tokens.Command(stdout=None, stderr=None, no_color=False)[source]¶

Django management command to delete all expired user tokens from model accounts.models.UserToken.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

Command:

python manage.py accounts_clear_user_tokens
